data.name: ethtxid
data.description: The transaction that calls freezeBurnERC20() on ERC20Manager contract

data.name: web3url
data.description: If using eth-proof fully qualified Web3 HTTP-RPC URL that eth-proof needs to obtain the transaction proof and receipt proof information needed by Syscoin to validate the mint

data.name: blocknumber
data.description: If ethtxid/web3url not provided. Block number of transaction including freezeBurnERC20() call

data.name: txvalue
data.description: If ethtxid/web3url not provided. Buffer value of the transaction hex encoded in RLP format

data.name: txroot
data.description: If ethtxid/web3url not provided. Buffer value of the transaction merkle root encoded in RLP format

data.name: txparentnodes
data.description: If ethtxid/web3url not provided. Buffer value of the transaction merkle proof encoded in RLP format

data.name: txpath
data.description: If ethtxid/web3url not provided. Buffer value of the merkle path for the transaction and receipt proof

data.name: receiptvalue
data.description: If ethtxid/web3url not provided. Buffer value of the transaction receipt hex encoded in RLP format

data.name: receiptroot
data.description: If ethtxid/web3url not provided. Buffer value of the receipt merkle root encoded in RLP format

data.name: receiptparentnodes
data.description: If ethtxid/web3url not provided. Buffer value of the receipt merkle proof encoded in RLP format
